snippet.title: Assassin's Creed Valhalla - The Way of the Berserker [Full Story Arc]
snippet.description:
Assassin's Creed Valhalla - The Way of the Berserker quests Guide / Mission Walkthrough played in Explorer / Drengr / Master Assassin difficulties in 4K (2160p / 60fps) - NO COMMENTARY

AC Valhalla Festival & Season Pass videos: https://bit.ly/3sqsdlY

0:00 - How to start "The Way of the Berserker"
0:47 - The Mysterious Berserker
8:44 - The Ritual of the Berserker
14:42 - The Vengeance of the Berserker
26:05 - Bjorn at Ravensthorpe

Quest: The Mysterious Berserker
Arc: The Way of the Berserker
Description: A mysterious Berserker has appeared in East Anglia. Eivor decides to seek him out and find out if the legends about Berserkers are true

Quest: The Ritual of the Berserker
Arc: The Way of the Berserker
Description: Bjorn is eager for revenge but must first concoct the Berserker Brew.

Quest: The Vengeance of the Berserker
Arc: The Way of the Berserker
Description: Newly rejuvenated, Bjorn charges to Beodoricsworth to exact revenge for his murdered wife.

► YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/AssassinsCreedSeries
► TWITTER: https://twitter.com/itsmealessio

#ACValhalla #AssassinsCreedValhalla #AssassinsCreedSeriesYT

Played on PC in Ultra High Definition.

ABOUT ASSASSIN'S CREED VALHALLA

In Assassin's Creed Valhalla, you are Eivor, a fierce Viking warrior raised on tales of battle and glory. Explore a dynamic and beautiful open world set against the brutal backdrop of England's Dark Ages. Raid your enemies, grow your settlement, and build your political power in your quest to earn your place among the gods in Valhalla.

ABOUT US

Assassin's Creed Series is a dedicated fan-channel in no way tied to Ubisoft. 

For more, visit:
► https://www.youtube.com/GTASeriesVideos
► https://www.youtube.com/GamesSeriesNetwork
► https://www.facebook.com/GamesSeries
► https://twitter.com/GamesSeries
